references.paper_title: Delving deeper into convolutional networks for learning video representations
references.reason: This paper is foundational for understanding deep learning applied to video, a crucial element of the presented video matting method.

references.paper_title: XMem: Long-term video object segmentation with an atkinson-shiffrin memory model
references.reason: This paper introduces a memory-based paradigm for video object segmentation, which is adapted and extended in the proposed method for video matting.

references.paper_title: Robust high-resolution video matting with temporal guidance
references.reason: This is a direct predecessor to the current work, focusing on video matting and providing a baseline for comparison of results.

references.paper_title: Adaptive human matting for dynamic videos
references.reason: This paper provides a relevant approach to human video matting and is compared against in the experimental evaluation.

references.paper_title: MaGGIe: Masked guided gradual human instance matting
references.reason: This paper offers a state-of-the-art mask-guided video matting method used for comparison and analysis in this research.
